details:
verb
- give an injection to
= example: give an injection to
= synonyms: shoot
- to introduce a new aspect or element
= example: to introduce a new aspect or element
- to insert between other elements
= synonyms: put in, come in, interject, interpose, throw in
- feed intravenously
- take by injection
= example: take by injection
- force or drive (a fluid or gas) into by piercing
= example: force or drive (a fluid or gas) into by piercing
= synonyms: shoot
